labels.name: A: In progress
labels.description: Work on the issue is in progress

issue.body:
### Issue URL (Anti Adblock Script) [NSFW] [https://hdmovie99.cv/](https://adguardteam.github.io/AnonymousRedirect/redirect.html?url=https%3A%2F%2Fhdmovie99.cv%2F) ### Comment > I’m experiencing an issue where the website hdmovie99.cv detects my AdGuard as an ad blocker and prevents me from accessing the site. Even when AdGuard is enabled with standard settings, the site shows a popup saying “Ads Blocker Detected.” ``` Username: @ShuvrojyotiRoy ``` ### [NSFW] Screenshots [Screenshot 1](https://cdn.adguardcdn.com/sitereports/9jcvcnisby80wsgocogosws0c44g8cspvfxo1egssg.jpg?nc=1) ### System configuration Information | Value --- | --- AdGuard product: | AdGuard for Android v4.12.1 System version: | `Android 15` Browser: | Chrome License type: | paid AdGuard mode: | VPN HTTPS filtering: | enabled Tracking protection: | **General settings**:
Block trackers,
